mapper.select: SELECT id AS "id", icon AS "icon", name AS "name", permission AS "permission", remark AS "remark", sort AS "sort", type AS "type", value AS "value", parent_id AS "parent_id" FROM sys_menu WHERE parent_id = #{id}

SELECT r.id AS "id", r.icon AS "icon", r.name AS "name", r.permission AS "permission", r.sort AS "sort", r.is_show AS "isShow", r.href AS "value", r.type AS "type", r.parent_id AS "parent_id" FROM sys_menu r LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu gr ON gr.menu_id = r.id LEFT JOIN sys_role g ON gr.role_id = g.id LEFT JOIN sys_user_role gu ON gu.role_id = g.id LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON gu.user_id = u.id WHERE u.id = #{userId} AND r.module = 2 AND r.is_show = 1 AND r.del_flag = 0 ORDER BY r.sort
